text.section:
A local support enforcement office:
shall be funded from local and federal resources; and
may keep any surcharge that is assessed against the obligor to defray the costs of support collection.

The Administration shall pay a county that has a local support enforcement office collection incentives pursuant to a methodology based on the performance of the county in accordance with regulations adopted by the Administration under subsection (d) of this section.
The rules, regulations, and standards of a local support enforcement office control if they generally conform to those adopted by the Secretary of Human Resources under § 10-114 of this subtitle.
The Administration shall adopt any regulations necessary to carry out the provisions of this section.
